title: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Establishment II B
content: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Establishment II B

title: Establishment II B - Point 2
content: House Rent Allowance (including of HRA in lieu of rent from accommodation)

title: Establishment II B - Point 4
content: Classification/Upgradation of cities for the grant of HRA & Transport Allowance

title: Establishment II B - Point 14
content: Parliament Questions relating to the subjects mentioned above

title: Establishment II B - Point 15
content: Public Grievances/RTI Matters relating to the subjects mentioned above

title: Establishment II B - Point 16
content: Cases requiring Sanctions of Cabinet Committee on Accommodation

title: Establishment II B - Point 17
content: Proposals regarding additions/alteration in Government residences of Ministers/Judges/MPs in Delhi, exceeding expenditure limits.

title: Establishment II B - Point 18
content: Policy matters having financial implications in respect of the following subjects which have been transferred to DOPT. (a) Reimbursement of Tuition Fees. (b) Children Education Assistance. (c) Overtime Allowance. (d) Honorarium (e) Special Allowance to Parliament Assistants. (f) Night Duty Allowance.

title: Establishment II B - Point 19
content: Proposals from Ministry of External Affairs: (a) Foreign Allowance Under IFS (PLCA) Rules, Hardship Allowance, Insurance for India based officials posted in Mission/posts abroad (b) Representational Grant, Compensatory Casual Leave. (c) Bhutan Compensatory Allowance.

title: Establishment II B - Point 20
content: Proposal from Department of Legal Affairs/Department of Revenue for revision of rates of Retainership Fee/Fee payable to Law Officers/Central Govt. standing counsels.
